description: Jump Desktop Connect - Remote desktop server application for Windows that allows remote connections via Jump Desktop clients
notes: Jump Desktop Connect enables your Windows computer to accept remote desktop connections using the Fluid protocol with end-to-end encryption.
This is a nonportable application that requires admin rights to install.

script: if (!(is_admin)) { error "$app requires admin rights to $cmd"; break }

uninstaller.script: if (!(is_admin)) { error "$app requires admin rights to $cmd"; break }
